pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inferential Statistics // Select set of parametric and non- parametric statistical tests. 'inferr' builds upon the solid set of statistical tests provided in 'stats' package by including additional data types as inputs, expanding and restructuring the test results. The tests included are t tests, variance tests, proportion tests, chi square tests, Levene's test, McNemar Test, Cochran's Q test and Runs test.
